import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Input } from 'reactstrap'; import NavbarSupervisor from '../../components/NavbarSupervisor'; function WorkerAttendance() { const [workers, setWorkers] = useState([ { workerID: 1, workerName: 'John', specialization: 'sewing', kpi: 10 }, { workerID: 2, workerName: 'Jane', specialization: 'sewing', kpi: 10 }, { workerID: 3, workerName: 'Bob', specialization: 'sewing', kpi: 10 }, ]); const handleOnChangeAgreement = (workerID, value) => { setWorkers(prevState => { const updatedWorkers = [...prevState]; const workerIndex = updatedWorkers.findIndex(worker => worker.workerID === workerID); updatedWorkers[workerIndex].attendance = value; return updatedWorkers; }); }; return (

); } export default WorkerAttendance;
